channel.title: Whonix Forum Setup - security
channel.description:
Hi, I am new here, new to whonix but very experienced with linux/debian/tails....
I have to say that I was surprised to see the 2fa uses google authenticator not PGP?
How can that be secure? I thought the whole point of whonix was security centered OS?
How can that be so if one involves google in the process?
Please, teach me......

item.title: Whonix Forum Setup - security
item.dc:creator: entr0py
item.description:
TOTP is industry standard - not specific to Google.
